update products
name = #{name},
description = #{description},
image = #{image},
category_id = #{categoryId},
price = #{price},
stock = stock + #{stock},
update_user = #{updateUser},
update_time = #{updateTime},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select p.name as name, p.description as description, p.image as image, p.price as price, c.id as category_id, c.parent_id as parent_category_id from products p left join categories c on p.category_id = c.id where p.id = #{id}

select id, name, image, price, stock from products
category_id = #{categoryId} and status = 1
and name like '%' || #{name} || '%'

select p.name as name, p.image as image, p.price as price, p.stock as stock, p.description as description, c.name as category_name, pc.name as parent_category_name, case when sc.products_id is not null then sc.quantity else 0 end as cart_quantity, case when f.products_id is not null then 1 else 0 end as is_favorite from products p left join categories c on p.category_id = c.id left join categories pc on c.parent_id = pc.id left join shopping_carts sc on p.id = sc.products_id and sc.user_id = #{userId} left join favorites f on p.id = f.products_id and f.user_id = #{userId} where p.id = #{id}
